short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Additional functionality and improvements for your Atlassian JIRA Project Management Software (v6.3.8+).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
jPlus extension provides additional and improvements for JIRA Project Management Software.
Abbilities:
- colorize Components tags based on your configuration
- minimize height of backlog rows
- provides quick jump navigation in long rows
- adding context menu for quick tickets estimation
- everything is configurable

If you are using JIRA Project Management, you can find this extension handy.
